ResumeParserData.Experience: NatWest Group Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2018 - Present  Leading the high-risk client team, responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on PEPs and high-risk clients. Ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies, and providing strategic insights to senior management on mitigating financial crime risks.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducting comprehensive due diligence on high-risk clients and PEPs.  Analyzing financial transactions to identify potential money laundering activities.  Collaborating with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory adherence.  Developing and implementing risk assessment frameworks.  Training and mentoring junior analysts on compliance and risk assessment techniques.  Preparing detailed risk reports for senior management and regulatory authorities.  Keeping abreast of changes in AML regulations and industry best practices.  Santander UK PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2015 - 2018  Conducted due diligence and risk assessments on PEPs and high-risk clients. Identified and mitigated financial crime risks, ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies.  Key Responsibilities :   Performing EDD on PEPs and high-risk clients.  Monitoring and analyzing client transactions for unusual activity.  Providing recommendations to mitigate identified risks.  Assisting in the development and update of AML policies and procedures.  Preparing and submitting compliance reports to regulatory bodies.  Participating in AML training programs and staying updated on regulatory changes.  Barclays Bank AML Compliance Analyst  Manchester, UK  2013 - 2015  Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence and risk assessments on new and existing clients. Ensured compliance with AML regulations and internal policies.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducting due diligence on new and existing clients.  Analyzing client transactions for signs of financial crime.  Assisting in the development of AML policies and procedures.  Preparing compliance reports for senior management.  Collaborating with other departments to enhance the overall risk management framework.

JobProfile.Title: Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Leading the high-risk client team, responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on PEPs and high-risk clients. Ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies, and providing strategic insights to senior management on mitigating financial crime risks. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducting comprehensive due diligence on high-risk clients and PEPs. 
 Analyzing financial transactions to identify potential money laundering activities. 
 Collaborating with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory adherence. 
 Developing and implementing risk assessment frameworks. 
 Training and mentoring junior analysts on compliance and risk assessment techniques. 
 Preparing detailed risk reports for senior management and regulatory authorities. 
 Keeping abreast of changes in AML regulations and industry best practices.

JobProfile.Title: PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Conducted due diligence and risk assessments on PEPs and high-risk clients. Identified and mitigated financial crime risks, ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Performing EDD on PEPs and high-risk clients. 
 Monitoring and analyzing client transactions for unusual activity. 
 Providing recommendations to mitigate identified risks. 
 Assisting in the development and update of AML policies and procedures. 
 Preparing and submitting compliance reports to regulatory bodies. 
 Participating in AML training programs and staying updated on regulatory changes.

JobProfile.Alias: analyst of compliance, analyst - compliance, compliance - analyst, compliance development analyst, analyst, operations compliance, compliance data analyst, analyst, compliance, tax compliance analyst, analyst compliance, analyst  - compliance, compliance-analyst, compliance -analyst

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence and risk assessments on new and existing clients. Ensured compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducting due diligence on new and existing clients. 
 Analyzing client transactions for signs of financial crime. 
 Assisting in the development of AML policies and procedures. 
 Preparing compliance reports for senior management. 
 Collaborating with other departments to enhance the overall risk management framework.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Experienced and dedicated PEP & High Risk Analyst with 10 years of experience in the banking industry. Specialized in conducting in-depth due diligence, identifying financial crime risks, and ensuring regulatory compliance. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a proven track record of managing high-risk client portfolios effectively.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Daniel has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Compliance Officers. 'The candidate has a total experience of 10 YearsThe candidate has been working as a Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst at NatWest Group for the last 6.7 years.

Daniel Carter

Professional Profile : 
Experienced and dedicated PEP & High Risk Analyst with 10 years of experience in the banking industry. Specialized in conducting in-depth due diligence, identifying financial crime risks, and ensuring regulatory compliance. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a proven track record of managing high-risk client portfolios effectively.

Education : 
University of Manchester (Russell Group) 
MSc Risk Management, Distinction
Graduated : 2015
University of Warwick (Russell Group) 
BSc Business Management, Upper Second Class Honours
Graduated : 2013

Career History : 
NatWest Group Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst
Manchester, UK
2018 - Present
Leading the high-risk client team, responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on PEPs and high-risk clients. Ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies, and providing strategic insights to senior management on mitigating financial crime risks.
Key Responsibilities : 
Conducting comprehensive due diligence on high-risk clients and PEPs.
Analyzing financial transactions to identify potential money laundering activities.
Collaborating with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory adherence.
Developing and implementing risk assessment frameworks.
Training and mentoring junior analysts on compliance and risk assessment techniques.
Preparing detailed risk reports for senior management and regulatory authorities.
Keeping abreast of changes in AML regulations and industry best practices.
Santander UK PEP & High Risk Analyst
Manchester, UK
2015 - 2018
Conducted due diligence and risk assessments on PEPs and high-risk clients. Identified and mitigated financial crime risks, ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies.
Key Responsibilities : 
Performing EDD on PEPs and high-risk clients.
Monitoring and analyzing client transactions for unusual activity.
Providing recommendations to mitigate identified risks.
Assisting in the development and update of AML policies and procedures.
Preparing and submitting compliance reports to regulatory bodies.
Participating in AML training programs and staying updated on regulatory changes.
Barclays Bank AML Compliance Analyst
Manchester, UK
2013 - 2015
Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence and risk assessments on new and existing clients. Ensured compliance with AML regulations and internal policies.
Key Responsibilities : 
Conducting due diligence on new and existing clients.
Analyzing client transactions for signs of financial crime.
Assisting in the development of AML policies and procedures.
Preparing compliance reports for senior management.
Collaborating with other departments to enhance the overall risk management framework.

Key Skills : 
Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) 
Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Compliance
Financial Crime Risk Assessment
Regulatory Compliance and Reporting
Transaction Monitoring
Risk Mitigation and Management
Team Leadership and Development
Analytical and Research Skills
Strong Communication and Reporting Skills

Professional Certifications :
